soffico.customerapi.util

Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • soffico.customerapi.util.JsonHelper

  • public class JsonHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class with methods to deal with strings containing JSON arrays.

    • Method Detail

      • convertHTTPDateTimeToXMLDate

        public static javax.xml.datatype.XMLGregorianCalendar convertHTTPDateTimeToXMLDate(java.lang.String dateString)
                                                                            throws emds.epi.decl.exceptions.TechnicalException
        Translate a date/time string according to RFC 1123 into an Orchestra date value. HTTP header fields may contain date/time values in the format of RFC 1123. e.g. Wed, 09 Apr 2008 23:55:38 GMT.
        Parameters:
        dateString - string containing a date/time value from a HTTP header field.
        Returns:
        a XMLGregorianCalendar
        Throws:
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.TechnicalException - if the dateString had a wrong format

      • parseJsonArray

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseJsonArray(java.lang.String sval)
                                                       throws emds.epi.decl.exceptions.ConfigurationException
        Parse a String representing a JSON array and return the contained values as a list of Strings.
        Parameters:
        sval - the string representing the JSON array.
        Returns:
        the list of values contained in the JSON array.
        Throws:
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.ConfigurationException

      • toJsonArray

        public static java.lang.String toJsonArray(java.lang.String[] values)
        Create a String representing a JSON array. The JSON array will contain the given values.
        Parameters:
        values - the values to be contained in the array.
        Returns:
        the JSON array.

      • toJsonArray

        public static java.lang.String toJsonArray(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                                           boolean revert)
        Create a String representing a JSON array. The JSON array will contain the given values.
        Parameters:
        values - the values to be contained in the array.
        revert - if true revert the order of the values.

        the JSON array.
